hints.content:
$\greenD{24}$ penguins went to Iceberg Island.  How many pictures are above Iceberg Island on the picture graph?

[[☃ image 1]]

$\blueD6$ pictures are above Iceberg Island.  

$\blueD6 \times \, \goldD? = \greenD{24}$

options.alt: A picture graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Vacation and the vertical axis labeled Number of penguins. Each vacation place is listed along the horizontal axis from left to right as follows: Iceberg Island, Chilly Town, and Winter Wonderland. The number of penguins for each vacation place is represented by the number of pictures of penguins plotted on the graph. Iceberg Island is represented by 6 pictures of penguins, Chilly Town is represented by 3 pictures of penguins, and Winter Wonderland is represented by 4 pictures of penguins. 6 pictures of penguins above Iceberg Island are labeled from 1 at the bottom to 6 at the top. !
